snippet: Over on the Media Decoder blog, Amy Chozick reports that the head of the Joint Center for Political and Economic Studies sent a letter to the debate commission urging them to hold a debate moderated by Hispanics or people of color.
abstract: Over on the Media Decoder blog, Amy Chozick reports that the head of the Joint Center for Political and Economic Studies sent a letter to the debate commission urging them to hold a debate moderated by Hispanics or people of color.

headline.main: Calls Escalate for Presidential Debate Aimed at Hispanics and People of Color
